battle_log_formatter.description: Formats a battle outcome into a standardized string for easy logging in the notepad.
battle_log_formatter.python_script:
effectiveness_map = {"super effective": ">", "not very effective": "!>", "no effect": "x>"}
symbol = effectiveness_map[input_data["effectiveness"]]
defender_type2_str = f'/{input_data["defender_type2"]}' if input_data.get("defender_type2") else ""
log_entry = f'- {input_data["attacker_type"]} {symbol} {input_data["defender_type1"]}{defender_type2_str}'
print(log_entry)

inventory_scanner.description: Scans the player's inventory list for a target item and returns whether it was found.

pathfinder.description: Calculates the shortest path from the player's current position to a target coordinate on the current map using a Breadth-First Search (BFS) algorithm. It can find paths to tiles adjacent to impassable targets and correctly handles one-way ledge traversal.

pokemon_locator.description: Scans a provided JSON list of Pokémon strings from a PC box to check if a target Pokémon (by nickname or species) is present.

spinner_maze_solver.description: Finds the shortest path in a spinner maze. It parses the map_xml_string, builds a graph including spinner traversals, and uses A* to find the path from the player's position to a target coordinate. Handles impassable targets by pathing to an adjacent tile.
